about_the_game:
The official Orbital Gear soundtrack composed by Johan Kalén is now available for purchase. With over 30 minutes of adrenaline pumping tunes.

Full track list
  • Orbital Gear - Ceratanium
  • Orbital Gear - Endless Trails
  • Orbital Gear - Galactic Frame
  • Orbital Gear - Neutron Collapse
  • Orbital Gear - Menu
  • Orbital Gear - Console Tracker Chip
  • Orbital Gear - Nebular Ops
  • Orbital Gear - Research Facility C-ID5
  • Orbital Gear - Construct


The soundtrack is located in your Orbital Gear directory:
\SteamApps\common\Orbital Gear\Orbital Gear Soundtrack[/b]

You can easily get to the directory by right clicking on Orbital Gear in your Steam Library and in Properties click "Browse Local Content" in the "Local Files"-tab.

name: Orbital Gear Soundtrack
short_description: The official Orbital Gear soundtrack composed by Johan Kalén is now available for purchase. With over 30 minutes of adrenaline pumping tunes!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
